SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Quality of Life in Inflammatory Bowel Disease Questionnaire - How frequent have your bowel movements been during the last two weeks?
Quality of Life in Inflammatory Bowel Disease Questionnaire - How often has the feeling of fatigue or of being tired and worn out been a problem for you during the last 2 weeks?
Quality of Life in Inflammatory Bowel Disease Questionnaire - How often during the last 2 weeks have you felt frustrated, impatient or restless?

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: IBDQ01-Unable to Attend School or Work
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Quality of Life in Inflammatory Bowel Disease Questionnaire - How often during the last 2 weeks have you been unable to attend school or do your work because of your bowel problem?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: IBDQ - Unable to Attend School or Work

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Quality of Life in Inflammatory Bowel Disease Questionnaire - How much of the time during the last 2 weeks have your bowel movements been loose?

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: IBDQ01-How Much Energy Have You Had
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Quality of Life in Inflammatory Bowel Disease Questionnaire - How much energy have you had during the last 2 weeks?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: IBDQ - How Much Energy Have You Had

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Quality of Life in Inflammatory Bowel Disease Questionnaire - How often during the last 2 weeks did you feel worried about the possibility of needing to have surgery because of your bowel problem?
Quality of Life in Inflammatory Bowel Disease Questionnaire - How often during the last 2 weeks have you had to delay or cancel a social engagement because of your bowel problem?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: IBDQ - Delay or Cancel Social Engagement

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Quality of Life in Inflammatory Bowel Disease Questionnaire - How often during the last 2 weeks have you been troubled by cramps in your abdomen?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: IBDQ - Troubled by Cramps in Abdomen

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Quality of Life in Inflammatory Bowel Disease Questionnaire - How often during the last 2 weeks have you felt generally unwell?

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: IBDQ01-Fear of Not Finding a Washroom
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Quality of Life in Inflammatory Bowel Disease Questionnaire - How often during the last 2 weeks have you been troubled because of fear of not finding a washroom?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: IBDQ - Fear of Not Finding a Washroom

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Quality of Life in Inflammatory Bowel Disease Questionnaire - How much difficulty have you had, as a result of your bowel problems, doing leisure or sports activities you would have liked to have done during the last 2 weeks?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: IBDQ - Difficulty Doing Leisure or Sports

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Quality of Life in Inflammatory Bowel Disease Questionnaire - How often during the last 2 weeks have you been troubled by pain in the abdomen?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: IBDQ - Troubled by Pain in Abdomen

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Quality of Life in Inflammatory Bowel Disease Questionnaire - How often during the last 2 weeks have you had problems getting a good night's sleep, or been troubled by waking up during the night?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: IBDQ - Problems Getting Sleep or Waking Up

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Quality of Life in Inflammatory Bowel Disease Questionnaire - How often during the last 2 weeks have you felt depressed or discouraged?
Quality of Life in Inflammatory Bowel Disease Questionnaire - How often during the last 2 weeks have you had to avoid attending events where there was no washroom close at hand?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: IBDQ - Avoid Events Where No Washroom

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Quality of Life in Inflammatory Bowel Disease Questionnaire - Overall, in the last 2 weeks, how much of a problem have you had with passing large amounts of gas?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: IBDQ - Problem Passing Large Amounts Gas

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Quality of Life in Inflammatory Bowel Disease Questionnaire - Overall, in the last 2 weeks, how much of a problem have you had maintaining or getting to, the weight you would like to be at?
Quality of Life in Inflammatory Bowel Disease Questionnaire - In general, how often during the last 2 weeks have you felt worried or anxious?
Quality of Life in Inflammatory Bowel Disease Questionnaire - How much of the time during the last 2 week have you been troubled by a feeling of abdominal bloating?

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: IBDQ01-Felt Relaxed and Free of Tension
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Quality of Life in Inflammatory Bowel Disease Questionnaire - How often during the last 2 weeks have you felt relaxed and free of tension?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: IBDQ - Felt Relaxed and Free of Tension

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Quality of Life in Inflammatory Bowel Disease Questionnaire - How much of the time during the last 2 weeks have you had a problem with rectal bleeding with your bowel movements?
Quality of Life in Inflammatory Bowel Disease Questionnaire - How much of the time during the last 2 weeks have you felt embarrassed as a result of your bowel problem?

Quality of Life in Inflammatory Bowel Disease Questionnaire - How much of the time during the last 2 weeks have you been troubled by a feeling of having to go to the bathroom even though your bowels were empty?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: IBDQ - Go to Bathroom Bowels Empty

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Quality of Life in Inflammatory Bowel Disease Questionnaire - How much of the time during the last 2 weeks have you felt tearful or upset?
Quality of Life in Inflammatory Bowel Disease Questionnaire - How much of the time during the last 2 weeks have you been troubled by accidental soiling of your underpants?
Quality of Life in Inflammatory Bowel Disease Questionnaire - How much of the time during the last 2 weeks have you felt angry as a result of your bowel problem?
Quality of Life in Inflammatory Bowel Disease Questionnaire - To what extent has your bowel problem limited sexual activity during the last 2 weeks?

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: IBDQ01-Nausea or Sick to Your Stomach
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Quality of Life in Inflammatory Bowel Disease Questionnaire - How much of the time during the last 2 weeks have you been troubled by nausea or feeling sick to your stomach?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: IBDQ - Nausea or Sick to Your Stomach

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Quality of Life in Inflammatory Bowel Disease Questionnaire - How much of the time during the last 2 weeks have you felt irritable?
Quality of Life in Inflammatory Bowel Disease Questionnaire - How often during the past 2 weeks have you felt a lack of understanding from others?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: IBDQ - Lack of Understanding From Others

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Quality of Life in Inflammatory Bowel Disease Questionnaire - How satisfied, happy, or pleased have you been with your personal life during the past 2 weeks?
